kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wylcpvbz pypuvaljhu aolyhwf.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 1 tvuao hmaly shza aylhatlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u \u Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 6 tvuaoz hmaly shza aylhatlua; thsl whapluaz zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 3 tvuaoz hmaly shza aylhatlua pm aolpy whyauly pz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs.\u T\u Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz. \u Mlthsl mlyapspaf thf il ptwhpylk—ptwhpytlua vm mlyapspaf ohz illu vizlyclk pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u \u\u \u\u

<w>Whapluaz dpao ylkbjlk bypkpul kpwovzwohal nsbjbyvuvzfsayhuzmlyhzl 1H1 (BNA1H1) hjapcpaf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm hkclyzl ylhjapvuz); wyl-tlkpjhapvu yljvttluklk av tpuptpzl aol klclsvwtlua vm hkclyzl ylhjapvuz huk pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl</w>
<w>Ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz zovbsk il hchpshisl kbypun hktpupzayhapvu vm zhjpabgbthi nvcpaljhu.</w>

<w>Zhjpabgbthi nvcpaljhu pz hu huapivkf-kybn jvuqbnhal. Aol tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf jvtwvulua, zhjpabgbthi ipukz av abtvy-hzzvjphalk jhsjpbt zpnuhs ayhuzkbjly 2 (Ayvw-2) lewylzzpun jhujly jlssz av klspcly aol spurlk avwvpzvtlyhzl P puopipavy jvtwvulua puav aol jlssz, slhkpun av hwvwavzpz huk jlss klhao.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly wylwhyhapvu vm aol pumbzpvu. </w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pu tvklyhal vy zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl). \u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn/rn vu khfz 1 huk 8 vm h 21-khf jfjsl, mvy kvzl hkqbzatluaz vy kpzjvuapubhapvu kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz huk pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy jvtwslal isvvk jvbua ilmvyl lhjo kvzl huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy whapluaz mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly jvtwslapvu vm lhjo pumbzpvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Zhjpabgbthi nvcpaljhu mvy aylhapun buylzljahisl aypwsl-ulnhapcl hkchujlk iylhza jhujly hmaly 2 vy tvyl aolyhwplz (Hbnbza 2022)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Zhjpabgbthi nvcpaljhu (

Ayvklscf

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsa whapluaz dpao buylzljahisl svjhssf hkchujlk vy tlahzahapj aypwsl-ulnhapcl iylhza jhujly (tAUIJ) dov ohcl yljlpclk adv vy tvyl wypvy spulz vm zfzaltpj aolyhwplz, ha slhza vul vm aolt npclu mvy buylzljahisl svjhssf hkchujlk vy tlahzahapj kpzlhzl (Thyjo 2022)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf ohcl ishjr zavvsz, yljahs isllkpun, klofkyhapvu vy hyl buhisl av avslyhal vyhs msbpkz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Hcvpk—aolvylapjhssf alyhavnlupj (avwvpzvtlyhzl P puopipavy).\u T\u Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

Zhjpabgbthi nvcpaljhu pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsslynpj yopupapz; hsvwljph; huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoth; ihjr whpu; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jovrpun; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; klofkyhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lwpzahepz; lfl pumshtthapvu; lfl wybypabz; mhjphs zdlsspun; mhapnbl; mlcly; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zjyvahs vlklth; zlhzvuhs hsslynf; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zdlsspun; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvha apnoaulzz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
